title: Design of an Adaptive Practice Model for Self-Directed STEM Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental STEM terminology and ability to utilize digital devices
context.additional_context: Blended Learning Design for Enhancing STEM Field Language Communication Skills in BYOD Environments for In-Service Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can solve STEM-related language tasks with 80% accuracy.
Learners implement weekly study plans with over 90% adherence using self-directed learning strategies.
Learners analyze formative assessment data to correct individual learning weaknesses at least three times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
